name: Keto Stuffed Pepper Casserole
author: Lauren Stathas
summary: A low-carb twist on a classic.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon coconut aminos, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place cauliflower in a food processor and pulse into grounds the size of rice grains
Transfer to a large casserole dish
Combine beef, onion, and garlic in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir until meat is browned and onion is tender, about 5 minutes
Add green bell peppers and Italian seasoning; continue cooking until slightly tender, about 2 minutes
Drain excess moisture from the beef mixture
Simmer until flavors combine, about 5 minutes
Add mixture to the cauliflower in the casserole dish; mix to combine
Shake coconut aminos over the casserole; top evenly with Cheddar cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until sauce is bubbly, about 35 minutes
